tweetcipher

Class Tweetcipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • tweetcipher.Tweetcipher

  • public class Tweetcipher
extends java.lang.Object
    Escola Politecnica da USP PCS2582 - Seguranca da Informacao Coursework #1: translation of "Tweetcipher" algorithm from C to Java. (Ref: http://cybermashup.com/2013/06/12/tweetcipher-crypto-challenge/)
    Author:
    Soon Hyung Kwon, Andre Hashimoto Oku

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void codec()
      Takes input stream ASCII characters until EOF then outputs ciphered message to the output IO stream.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main method runs the codec mechanism.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tweetcipher

        public Tweetcipher(java.lang.String mode,
           java.lang.String key256,
           java.lang.String key128)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        mode - 'e' for encryption, 'd' for decryption.
        key256 - 32 ASCII character string.
        key128 - 16 ASCII character string.
